meanings.sent1: She litigates in court to resolve disputes.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer litigates on behalf of their client.
meanings.sent3: The cat litigates with the dog over who gets the sunny spot.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm litigates with the sky, demanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The determined squirrel litigates for the last acorn in the tree.

meanings.sent1: He litigates against the company for unfair treatment.
meanings.sent2: The plaintiff litigates for damages in the civil court.
meanings.sent3: The penguin litigates against the fish market for selling out of anchovies.
meanings.sent4: The sunlit sky litigates against the darkness of night.
meanings.sent5: The brave knight litigates against the dragon for the safety of the kingdom.
